removeItemsFromOrder() - Method in class Restaurant.OrderController
Removes items from order at waiters discretion; need to check with chefs etc Checks if there intended removal with actual existing orders Will prevent user from removing more items than actually exists

removeMenuItem(int, int) - Method in class Restaurant.Menu
Removes the relevant menu item based on the ID Updates the relevant arraylist and text file accordingly
removeMenuItemUI() - Method in class Restaurant.MenuController
User interface for removing an existing menu item from the menu Asks the user for the type of menu item he/she wants to remove, followed by the menu item's ID, then it performs error checking just to make sure that the menu ID entered by the user exists in the menu

Restaurant - Class in Restaurant
this is an entity class throughout the duration of application runtime, only one instance of this class is created stores main information about the restaurant
Restaurant() - Constructor for class Restaurant.Restaurant
constructor for restaurant reads the text files "tables.txt", "staff.txt", "transhistday.txt" and "reservationsrecords.txt" based on the information in the textfiles, objects are created and arraylists are updated.
